entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Rebuild of native parts of coreclr and libraries doesn't work with cross build #65533
  • RegexOptions.NonBacktracking fixed-length markers never triggered #65532
    7.0.0
  • Allow creation of a root Activity when Activity.Current is not null #65528
    Future
  • NullableConverter does not flow serialization state #65522
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: StringBuilder.Insert(int, StringBuilder) #65519
  • SslCertificateTrust is not sent on Windows #65515
    7.0.0
  • LoadGdipImageFromStream when BuiltInComInteropSupport=false #65510
  • Unable to work with PerformanceCounters when running with Globalization Invariant Mode #65502
    6.0.4
  • Should the DllImportGenerator be packable or not? #65495
    7.0.0
  • JsonObject does not respect JsonSerializerOptions e.g. PropertyNamingPolicy = JsonNamingPolicy.CamelCase #65493
  • Make it possible to build just the shared framework projects or the out-of-band projects #65492
    7.0.0
  • Regressions in System.MathBenchmarks.Double #65513
  • Regressions in System.Net.Primitives.Tests.IPAddressPerformanceTests #65512
  • Regressions in System.Tests.Perf_String #65511
  • [wasm] running tests on NodeJs fails with `globalThis is not defined` #65485
  • [mono] AOT compiler fails when assembly files are named in other cultures #65484
    6.0.x
  • Composite images add their code ranges to the code manager too often #65481
  • Test failure System.IO.Compression.ZLibStreamUnitTests.ReadWrite_Success #65476
  • Test failure JIT\\HardwareIntrinsics\\X86\\Fma_Vector256\\Fma_ro\\Fma_ro.cmd #65474

Closed

  • Make it possible to build only the inbox portion of libs #51168
    Future
  • Assertion failed 'fgClassInstrumentor->SchemaCount() == info.compClassProbeCount' #65499
    7.0.0
  • Arm64: Better addressing mode for float/double array access #64819
    7.0.0
  • codegenarmarch.cpp:3201 Assertion failed '(gcInfo.gcRegGCrefSetCur & killMask) == 0' #65395
    7.0.0
  • On modern runtimes, HttpClient.GetAsync is really slow to localhost, really fast to 127.0.0.1 #65375
    7.0.0
  • System.Net.NetworkInformation.Tests.PingTest.SendPingWithHostAndTimeoutAndBuffer failing on OSX #64963
  • API proposal: Nullable.RefValue, RefValueOrDefault #1534
    7.0.0
  • Http proxy not working with authentication #64459
    7.0.0
  • ReadyToRun images crash if compiled for AVX2 but run on non-AVX2 CPU #61471
    7.0.0
  • JsonSerializerContext.GetTypeInfo depends on hidden value #65306
  • HttpClient: Header allocations #31235
    7.0.0
  • Enable Mariner 2.0 DEPS package #65441
    7.0.0
  • Expand the maximum argument count of (Value)Tuple.Create() #29603
    Future
  • PowerShell running as SSH subsystem child SIGABRTs in a linux container #65232
  • System.Net.NetworkInformation.Tests.PingTest.SendPingToExternalHostWithLowTtlTest Failures #65065
  • Loading of XML files fails when using prefix for long paths #59122
    7.0.0
  • System.Diagnostics.Process.Kill(entireProcessTree: true) doesn't kill entire process tree on dotnet Debian images #45017
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Handle exceptions while evaluating expressions #61665
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.IO.Tests.NamedPipeFileStreamConnectedConformanceTests.ReadWrite_Success_Large #65475
  • ILVerification fails unexpectedly on delegate construction #65010
  • Normalize `Vector64/Vector128.Create(0)/Create(0,0, ..)` to `Vector64/Vector128.Zero` #63490
  • [QUIC] Use server TLS options in QUIC #32071
    7.0.0
  • [mini] gshared static virtual methods: asserts !sig->has_type_parameters #65394
    7.0.0
  • Escape analysis inconsistency #65463

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump next from 11.1.3 to 12.1.0 in /src/mono/sample/wasm/browser-nextjs #65534
    area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution
  • Skip RegexOptions.NonBacktracking phase 3 for some patterns #65531
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • Allow Trace Samplers to Modify the Activity Trace State #65530
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Activity, 7.0.0
  • Add line break to please Firefox #65529
    area-Meta
  • [release/6.0] Run tests for internal azdo PRs #65526
    area-Infrastructure
  • Create snapcraft.yaml for 7.0 #65525
    area-Snap
  • Support resumable serialization in NullableConverter<T> #65524
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Make sure WinHttpHandler 6.0.1 is released #65523
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.x
  • [wasm] Disable wasm aot tests hitting OOM on all platforms #65521
    arch-wasm, wasm-aot-test
  • Publish crossgen for pkg #65520
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • #52615 Enable tests crashing on CI #65518
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Rollback emscripten to 2.0.23 #65517
    * NO MERGE *, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [draft][wasm] Implicit NodeJS version on Helix #65514
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/6.0] [mono] Fix stacktrace from DIM #65509
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono, 6.0.x
  • Clean-up slngen related logic #65507
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Improve PipeWriterTests.CompleteWithLargeWriteThrows #65506
    area-System.IO.Pipelines
  • [wasm] Replace active issue for browser platform with NodeJS only #65505
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Remove OpenSSL error queue checking in SslInitializer #65501
    area-System.Net
  • Fix XNodeReaderFunctionalTests #65500
    area-System.Xml
  • [wasm][ignore] check main with emscripten 2.0.23 #65496
    * NO MERGE *, area-Build-mono
  • [No review] NativeAOT CoreCLR testing #65491
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use CopyContext to restore saved context on X86 #65490
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Checking CI build for segmenting diagnostics eventpipe tests for Android #65489
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • [Mono] Enable generating SIMD intrinsics for System.Numerics.Vector on Arm64 #65486
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • add RID for Ubuntu 22.04 #65483
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • More clean up for RegexOptions.NonBacktracking #65479
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [release/6.0] Add dependencies on EMSDK manifest bands for coherency in installer #65478
  • Adding Regex.IsMatch(Span) and RegexRunner.Scan() methods #65473
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation

Merged

  • Move architecture-specific code out of codegencommon.cpp #65488
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update main branding to preview 3 #65346
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix PerformanceCounter's when running with Globalization Invariant Mode #65414
    area-System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter
  • Move IsKnownConstant handling to ExtendedDefaultPolicy #64809
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • PGO: Profile isinst/castclass #65460
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Replace picture of API review process with diagram #65527
    area-Meta
  • Update tests to help uncover CrossGen2 scenario validation #65477
    area-Interop-mono, 7.0.0
  • JIT: better addressing mode for floating point on arm64 #65468
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add retries to SPMI download #65516
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Clear GC info when consuming GT_PUTARG_SPLIT nodes #65432
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add Nullable.GetValueRefOrDefaultRef API #64677
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix ping tests on OSX #65508
    area-System.Net
  • Disable R2R code for all associated components of a composite image #65482
    area-ReadyToRun-coreclr
  • Use `push` for 8/12 byte struct args on x86 #65387
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix verification of open delegates #65425
    area-ILVerification
  • Enable Mariner 2.0 DEPS package #65442
    area-Infrastructure-installer, 7.0.0
  • Add xargs for dotnet format command #65090
    area-Infrastructure
  • Move MacCatalyst arm64 leg definitions from runtime-staging to runtime-extra-platforms pipeline #65427
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add @teo-tsirpanis to community triagers #65503
    area-Meta
  • [wasm] HTTP tests on NodeJS #65303
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 7.0.0
  • Remove OpenSSL error queue checking in SslInitializer #65435
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Process.Unix: reap all processes when running as pid 1. #65061
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix exceptions on eval #64374
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Remove dead code in illink.targets #65494
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Avoid additional AssemblyInfo output file #65465
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Morph `Vector.Create(0)` to `Vector.Zero` #63821
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add reminder for package authoring #65480
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [Mono] Fix OP_FMAX an OP_FMIN on amd64 and lift the overly restricted architecture limitation #65445
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Remove or move some expensive low-value testing #65453
    area-Infrastructure
  • [JIT] More ARM64 comparison instruction optimizations with Vector.Zero #64783
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Add checks for interpreter stack overflow. #65315
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [mono][jit] Compute the type of generic context used by static virtua… #65459
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • update SSL tests to deal better with disabled protocols #65120
    area-System.Net.Security, test enhancement
  • Disable component governance for musl runs #65454
  • [wasm] Disable aot tests failing due to OOM #65413
    arch-wasm, wasm-aot-test

Updated

  • [LoongArch64] JIT/EE interface for getting ABI-info #62893
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-jit directory #62843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • [draft][wasm] JSImport/JSExport prototype #64493
    NO REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • align GC memory load calculation on Linux with Docker and Kubernetes #64128
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] First draft of debug on firefox #61776
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Remove the Unix code from `System.Drawing.Common`. #64623
    area-System.Drawing, community-contribution
  • Fix remaining COM warnings in crossgen2 #65297
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [DRAFT][PERF][MAUI] Add startup time and size mesauresments for dotnet-podcast app #65398
  • [wasm][debugger] Optional param fix 56251 #64970
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm] Rationalize wasm jobs run on CI #65035
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Send CA names on Linux and OSX #65195
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • JIT: Unroll Equals and StartsWith for constant strings and spans. [0..32] chars #65288
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Forward DefaultDllImportSearchPathsAttribute to the inner P/Invoke. #65458
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Add "[createdump]" prefix to all createdump output and logging for VS4Mac #65444
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix Type.IsPublic for pointer and byref types #65156
    area-System.Reflection
  • Structs: Do not mark "Hidden buffer pointer" as address-exposed #64130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve incremental build times of the libraries subset #64000
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • Allow constant propagation of Vector.Zero. #65028
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Class types with layout that inherit from System.Object should be ManagedSequential #65447
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • FIX | Adds support for Shim gss api on Linux to delay loading libgssapi_krb… #65469
    area-System.Net
  • Updating the x64 casting behavior to be IEEE 754 compliant and to use saturation for overflow #61761
    breaking-change, area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [tests][eventpipe] Port over Dotnet/Diagnostics to enable eventpipe tests on Android #64358
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Optimize the Regex source generator's handling of `Compilation` objects. #65431
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • Add a transport package with libmono-profiler-aot.so on Android #65401
    area-Build-mono
  • [mono][wasm] Allow AOTing methods with catch/filter clauses. #64867
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [wasm] bump sdk for workload testing to 7.0.100-preview.2.22108.4 #65003
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono][llvm] Fix crashes when methods fail LLVM compilation. #65391
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Added OnesComplement, Sqrt, Negate vector intrinsics #65438
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Fix Vector256.IsHardwareAccelerated in R2R binaries #65351
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [Mono] Add SIMD intrinsic for Vector64/128 comparisons #65128
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Do not reorder HTTP header values #65249
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Changes to reduce committed memory: #65367
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [Mono] Add linux-x64 coop gc test run to runtime-staging #64468
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm] Emscripten 3.1.1 bump #63894
    area-Build-mono
  • [EventPipe] Fix reverse connection socket leaking to child processes. #65365
    EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Treat TZCNT/POPCNT/LZCNT as never negative #64951
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add RIDs for MIRACLE LINUX 8 and 9 #61304
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Add FlagsAttribute to GC_ALLOC_FLAGS #65461
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] [wasm][debugger] Fixing race condition #64648
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono, 6.0.4
  • Improve ImmutableArray.RemoveRange #65186
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [mono] Cache aotdata file in AOTCompiler task #65472
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [wasm] Use `--emit-symbol-map` to generate a `dotnet.js.symbols` #65162
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [No Review] Trying Server 2022 in main pipeline #65236
    * NO MERGE *, NO REVIEW, area-Infrastructure
  • [wasm] bump sdk for workload testing to 7.0.100-preview.1.22108.2 #65006
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Generate 300 band Mono.Toolchain manifest #65308
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-mono

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-17
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Build and cache struct types in llvm.cpp #1854

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • "dotnet sdk check" command fails on all(?) systems #23998
  • net472 target framework no longer working #23996
  • MSBuild AvailablePlatforms property should include arm64 #23994
  • DPAPI error messages since updating VS to 17.1.0 #23989

Closed

  • Using target runtime win-x64 include runtime assets which should be excluded #23669
    Discussion

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix self-contained warning #23705 #23999
  • Backport PR #23748 to 6.0.3xx #23995
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add snapshot tests for 5.0 and 6.0 Blazor WASM apps #23992
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Fix escaping function when argument ends with odd number of backslashes #23988
    Area-DotNet Test

Merged

  • Templating update 7.0.100 preview.2.22116.8 #23983
    Area-CodeFlow

Updated

  • Add test retry #21186
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Rename "NetSdkManaged" types to "FileBased" #23955
    Area-Workloads
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1619383 #23858
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Next set of three test projects to move to Helix. #23975
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Annotate content items for web projects with a special attribute #23973
    Area-AspNetCore

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-17
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Champion: Simplified parameter null validation code #2145
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Raw string literal #4304
    Working Set

PullRequests

Merged

  • Fix typo: Resoved -> Resolved #5791

Updated

  • Update links to the spec documents to point to the ECMA standard draft #5739
  • Use better examples in pattern-variables proposal #5781

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Remove Unnecessary Braces Refactoring #59628
  • ArgumentException from AnalyzerDriver #59626
  • ArgumentOutOfRangeException in CSharpWrappingCodeRefactoringProvider #59624
  • Value tracking tool window needs more/better information #59621
  • When creating a new project, the dialog should suggest popular roslyn analyzers to include. #59620
  • Updating the C# LSIF tool to latest spec #59617
  • "Convert to switch statement" refactoring generates invalid code #59616
  • Suboptimal code for non-linear is-pattern expressions compared to switch #59615
  • Compiler perf improvements #59611
  • IDE0073 triggered when header template unspecified #59606
  • Interpolated raw string literals don't handle double braces correctly #59603
    17.2
  • Use synthesized wrapper methods for compiler-generated 'throw's #59601
    17.2
  • Secondary dashed line appears in raw string literals #59598

Closed

  • Consolidate data tracked over an async completion session #59262
    17.3
  • Mechanism to go-to overriden member declaration/definition #59619
  • WPF UserControl inheriting abstract class should have a quick action to implement it #59623
  • INamespaceOrTypeSymbol.GetTypeMembers does not return all type members. #59517
    17.2
  • Missing warning for incorrect parameter nullability on override that causes a NullReferenceException #48944
    17.1
  • Double-clicking error/warning coming from a source generated file the IDE should navigate to the location #50695
    17.2
  • No live analysis/intellisense diagnostics for source-generator outputs #50357
    17.2
  • Source Generators: Documents with generated content doesn't permit code fix execution #49533
    17.2
  • Diagnostic Analyzer Runner crashes when encountering invalid generic parameterless constructor pattern #59330
  • Enable unsafe code refactoring creates unnecessarily complex projects #44301
    Backlog
  • Parameter null checking compilation fails with parameter in async method #59614
  • inlined multiline raw string literal #59609
  • ToString format specifier completion for Guid shows DateTime specifiers instead #59453
    Backlog
  • char constant in Linq Queryable expression is converted to int #58886
  • Pattern matching null check should be eliminated if has been checked #59449
    17.2

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix crash in initializer wrapping with trailing comma #59629
    Area-IDE
  • Fix 'unnecessary assigment' false posititive for out argument (#58564) #59625
    Area-IDE
  • Produce specific error for misplaced 'record' keyword #59622
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Records
  • Remove `NullableSyntaxAnnotationEx` #59618
    Area-IDE
  • Produce a specific error for 'enum' as constraint #59612
    Area-Compilers
  • Allow exception local to be used in filter prologue in async methods #59608
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix issue with curlies being innapropriately unescaped in raw string literals. #59607
    Area-Compilers
  • [LSP] Cache parsed xml snippets for razor #59605
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • SyntaxWrappingOptions #59604
    Area-IDE
  • Review feedback from #59510 #59600
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Use the same codepath for computing light-bulb actions to determine if hte lightbulb shoudl appear at all. #59599
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to features/rename_ui_rework #59596
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Consolidate data tracked over an async completion session #59553
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove potential partial snapshot in codefixservice #59586
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #59597
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Move VisualStudioProject.BatchingDocumentCollection to it's own file #59589
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Address feedback from previous pattern matching ReadOnlySpan<char> change #59451
    Area-Compilers
  • Support live diagnostics in source generated files #58363
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required, Next
  • Delete directory in semantic-snippets feature branch #59571
    Area-IDE
  • Port more tests #59587
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to main #59613
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to release/dev17.2 #59610
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Allow codefixservice to stream codefixes as it is computed, instead of waiting for all fixes to be ready. #59585
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Try to reuse previously parsed trees when changing parse options #59406
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #59602
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix DateTime completion appearing innapropriately #59592
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Compute fixes by order of fixers, so we don't have to sort them after #59584
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #59595
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Updated

  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #59630
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Format list patterns #57568
    Area-IDE
  • Clean up diagnostic and solution crawler options - take 2 #59233
    Area-IDE
  • Use BatchFixer to fix all for naming violation #59452
    Area-IDE
  • Value Tracking: Remove inproc symbol usage #59473
    Area-IDE
  • Move GenerateOverridesOptions and BlockStructureOptions to global options #59508
    Area-IDE
  • EditorFeatures.Cocoa: Build with net6.0-macos #59429
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Refactor indentation API #57529
    Area-IDE
  • Render exception documentation texts. #56162
    Area-IDE
  • Semantic Snippets: Console snippet first look #59303
    Area-IDE
  • Initial sketch of exposing imports from the semantic model #59533
    Area-Compilers, api-ready-for-review
  • Do not remove parentheses from arithmetic ops in 'checked' contexts #59552
    Area-IDE
  • Print method name and hexadecimal offsets in ILVerify output #59583
    Area-Compilers
  • Backport "Remove handling of certain BCL binaries from our build" to 17.0 #59588
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Main attributes for simple programs #59471
    Area-Compilers
  • Update source-build dependency to source-build-externals #59549
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Propagate CodeActionOptions through fix all #59575
    Area-IDE
  • [semi-auto-props]: Add more tests (GetMembers, speculative semantic model) #59270
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • add all analyzers that are configured via editorconfig to code cleanup #59106
    Area-IDE
  • Diagnostic incremental analyzer #59456
    Area-IDE
  • Update Parser.md #56987
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Reopen of #40132 #40292
  • Go-to-definition in C# files on Razor generated code does not bring me to .razor file #40290
    Backlog
  • Custom icon is not getting set in visual studio 2019 #40289
  • Blazor documentation needs additional real usage examples for settings #40288
  • When Consuming Razor Class Library Project it is very cumbersome to get the Right RCL Project Name for the Static Resource #40287
  • Add support for passing Metadata Seed to the underlying oidc-client in WASM Authentication #40286
  • Identity: email confirmation codes are case sensitive #40285
  • Some Blazor WebAssembly DLLs are quarantined by anti-virus #40283
  • Razor in CSS preprocessor support #40281
  • Visual Studio for mac 运行 net6 mvc 时,The view '···' was not found. #40280
  • AddRazorRuntimeCompilation Error #40291

Closed

  • Investigate why SingleFileExe tests fail in Helix #25103
    7.0-preview3
  • HotReload displays WebSocket connection error message in browser console for ASP.NET Core app run in VS2022 but not on dotnet watch run #40264
  • WebApplication.New().ServerFeatures is null #40042
    7.0-preview3
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper #40180
  • VS Code: After installing .net 7.0, open a mvc6.0 project and encounter a warning: "Dereference of a possibly null reference." #40282
  • Razor runtime compilation doesnt work second time with virtual file path providers? #40012
  • Signalr hub inject service #40112
  • RenderTreeDiffBuilder – components after components with @key are often recreated #39053
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Virtualize component's Items property should be IReadOnlyCollection #40247
  • BACKROUND SERVICE IN ASP.NET CORE #40266
  • Can't Use IJSRuntime.InvokeVoidAsync to Call JavaScript Arrow Function #40258
  • Blazor UI Events not firing in SPA in Site Path #40246

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump Polly to 7.2.3 #40284
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Add Request Decompression middleware #40279
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Update url-parse #40277
    area-signalr, area-blazor

Merged

  • Re-enable SingleFileExe #39977
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview3
  • Set WebApplication.New().ServerFeatures #40183

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add clear image caching APIs #4766
    Future
  • Span Text cannot be changed #4765
  • VisualElement.Bounds's size does not match IView.Width/Height #4764
  • Flyout margins and settings do not display correctly #4762
  • Blazor Hybrid, not able to link to static resource form RCL project #4760
  • [Android] Maui Blazor, static files from Razor Class Library not included in wwwroot #4758
  • Crash on IOS adding items to an ObservableCollection after Render #4756
  • IsEnabled not working properly for layout #4755
  • Child view size exceeds the parent view size #4749
  • [Windows]Flow direction RTL not working in HorizontalStackLayout #4748
  • Vertical Text of a Label? #4746
  • Add npm support into .NET MAUI Blazor template #4745
  • [Bug] In a Shell enabled App, after traversing to a page defined with the attached property `Shell.PresentationMode="ModalAnimated"` Flyout menu becomes inaccessible #4744
  • [Android]RTL flow direction not working for image #4743
  • [Android]RTL flow direction not working in Button #4742
  • Do not run sIn file in Visual Studio 2022 for Mac version 17.0 Preview 6 #4741
  • XAML editor no longer working for MAUI library in Preview 13 #4740
  • The splash screen icon (Assets\appiconfgSplashScreen.png) listed in the manifest is not found #4736
  • Images no longer render in Preview 13 #4735
  • Span Gesture doesn't work #4734
  • MAUI WebView is not displaying body background-image #4733

Closed

  • ViewExtensions.GetViewTransform should return transform to root rather than parent #4690
  • [Bug][Template] Add AssemblyInfo.cs to the template #2207
  • [Bug] Border StrokeShape needs typeconverter for XAML #2690
    6.0.101-preview.10
  • VS17.1Prv1: MAUI fails default project build even after updating manually via maui-check & template update #3419
  • Default templates for both blazor and regular won't even compile #4148
  • NRE when typing into Editor on Windows #3477
  • ProgressBar doesn't render on Windows #3479
  • [Bug] Alerts currently don't work if you call them from the constructor #1514
  • [Android] SwipeItemView using a Frame is not rendering correctly #4118
  • [Android] Dynamically adding SwipeItems not render the BackgroundColor correctly #4120
  • CarouselView Do Not Work [Bug] #2225
  • Intent-Filter in AndroidManifest.xml causes build to fail unexpectedly and without error. #4737
  • Fake issue #4703

PullRequests

Created

  • [templates] add global.json to pin to .NET 6 #4767
  • Interfaced handlers for ContentView, DatePicker, Editor #4763

Merged

  • Essentials.AppActions refactored to interface and singleton #4596

  • Remove debug checks #4738

    platform/iOS 🍎, area/a11y
  • Add FabricBot rules for s/needs-repro label #4739

  • Allow to use string to define StrokeShape in XAML #3256

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Case Insensitive string comparison in Composite Foreign Keys #27467
  • ef core ignores parameterized constructor if parameterless constructor exists #27466
  • Errormessages already contain the exception with the stacktrace. #27465
  • error converting datetime in ef core #27464
  • Is it possible to save only some properties? #27462

PullRequests

Merged

  • Correct checked-in merge conflict #27463
  • Update branding to preview3 #27461
    area-infrastructure

Updated

  • Fix to #27423 - Renaming and dropping columns with Temporal Tables generates faulty migration #27452

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET MAUI should not be installable from .NET 7 #13246

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove MAUI manifests for now #13247
  • Update 6.0.2xx with the current state of 1xx #13244
  • Disable component governance for the non-shipping legs. #13243
  • Create snapcraft.yaml for 7.0 #13242

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'main' #13234
  • Remove bootstrapping for CI builds now that we use CentOS7 previously-source-built #13232

Updated

  • [release/6.0.1xx] Add source-build tests for dotnet format #13207
  • Merge 6.0.200 into 6.0.3xx #13236
  • Adjust handling of reference packages directory #13238
